activities: At intake, CMI will gather personal contact information and business data, including: last day worked, recent job title, company name and location, workplace identification number(s), full name, a home or physical address, email address(es), and telephone number(s). This information is used for client contact and reference purposes only.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All collected and volunteered personal and professional information and data is covered under CMI's Safe Harbor Framework self-certification process. This includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: CMI has agreed to JAMS Safe Harbor Alternate Dispute Resolution Program as the independent dispute resolution mechanism.
